tool_description: A highly configurable and precise solution for augmenting your moderation needs, scalable and adaptable for various platforms. State-of-the-art detection of cyberbullying, verbal aggression and toxic messages powered by Samurai Labs’ neuro-symbolic AI along with a suite of moderation tools that empowers you to maintain peace in your community. Protect your community and integrate the Cyber Guardian into your moderation suite with this easy to set up API. Use the "setup" endpoint to initialize...
name: Cyber Guardian
title: Cyber Guardian

api_list.name: setup
api_list.description: Generates a link that grants access to the configuration dashboard for the Cyber Guardian and redirects you to it, already logged in through Rapid.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cyber-guardian.p.rapidapi.com/setup"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cyber-guardian.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cyber-guardian.p.rapidapi.com/setup"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cyber-guardian.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
